oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pulmonary function changes induced by three regimens of bronchodilating agents in calves with acute respiratory distress syndrome
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Genicot, B.
Close, R.
Lindsey, J. K.
Lekeux, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: acute respiratory distress syndrome
double-muscled calves
aerosolised bronchodilators
sympathomimetic
parasympatholytic
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two aerosolised bronchodilators, one sympathomimetic and one parasympatholytic, were tested either alone or in combination for their ability to improve the pulmonary function of double-muscled calves suffering from acute respiratory distress syndrome.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1995; 134
